page.description: Specify the in-line style for the heading text. Tip: a common use of this property is to right-justify the heading for numeric data. For example: 'text-align:right;'

figure.title: Colorful headings created in the style editor.

section.description: Clicking on the [...] button next to the Heading in-line style opens the Style Editor. This makes it easy to change the font, background color, and border of the heading. It also allows you to add images to the background, alter the padding, text alignment, margins, and more.
